text: Salim Ahmed Salim (, Urdu: , , born 23 January 1942) is a Tanzanian diplomat. He was the 4th Prime Minister of Tanzania from 24 April 1984 to 5 November 1985. ==References== ==Other websites== * Presidents of the General Assembly * The South Center â€“ Geneva * East African Center for Constitutional Development * Salim's Speech on HIV/AIDS * Salim on Darfur * Press release on Darfur * AU in Darfur Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Tanzania Category:Tanzanian diplomats
